titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to promote the care and treatment of veterans in State veterans nursing homes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the amount of reimbursement which the Administrator of Veterans Affairs shall pay to the States for furnishing domiciliary, hospital, or nursing home care to eligible veterans who receive such care in State facilities.
